name: ATROX NOCTIS: Dark Horror Role-playing, You Can Dance To
blurb: ATROX NOCTIS is modern horror, featuring real haunted locations, and an incredible live dubstep music scene.

rewards.reward: All supporters at any level will also recieve a signed ATROX NOCTIS promo card. This card will have been signed by the game designers and the musical talent. If you have yet to check out Beat Thief Inc,. makle sure to visit www.audioplaygroundent.com
We appreciate any level of support. Anyone who contributes will be listed and thanked in the game credits, in the game and on the website.
At this level, you will receive your name in the credits, and receive the rare Glock 19 with mounted Light. This item will never be available for purchase in game, only through the labor system.

At this level, you will receive your name in the credits, and the rare Glock 19 with mounted Light. In addition, we will include the Mossberg 590 Combat Shotgun, an item not scheduled for open release for some time.

At this level, you will receive your name in the credits, and all the limited weapons above. In addition, we will include the Black Night Vision Goggles, an item that will only be available to limited characters later in the game.

At this level, you will receive your name in the credits, and all the in game limited weapons and gear above. In addition, we will include the special edition \u00bd\u201d ATROX NOCTIS Pentagram Charm. This is a real world item; learn the secrets of man\u2019s past, and forgotten history.

At this level, you will receive your name in the credits, and all the in game limited weapons and gear above. In addition, we will include the special edition GNOS Airfoil Ink Pen, an item that carries the promises of humanity for our future generations (or so GNOS claims). This is a real world item, so you can write all your friends and tell them about your great discovery!

At this level, you will receive your name in the credits, and all the in game limited weapons and gear above. In addition, we will include the special edition ATROX NOCTIS: Party t-shirt. This is a real world item; sport your love for the game and the music.

At this level, you will receive your name in the credits, and all the in game limited weapons and gear above. In addition, we will include the special edition ATROX NOCTIS: Pedro Luwanis t-shirt. This is a real world item; sport your love for the game and the music. This shirt is a $1 more due to a unique cross promotion that will enable owners of the shirt and those who see the shirt to participate in a totally new level of interactivity, not seen in games before to our knowledge!

At this level, you will receive your name in the credits, and all the in game limited weapons and gear above. In addition, we will include the special edition ATROX NOCTIS: Zombie Stomp t-shirt. This is a real world item; sport your love for the game and the music. This will be a very limited t-shirt, no more than 200 will ever be made, and we're taking at least 13 of them. Also, to show our appreciation in game, any supporter at this level or above will receive free tickets to every live event for the next two years in ATROX NOCTIS. Many will be free already, but the big talent wants paid to perform, you know how artist are, lol.

At this level, you will receive your name in the credits, and all the in game limited weapons and gear above. In addition, we will include the special edition leather bound \u201cThe Stranger\u201d manuscript signed by the author. Learn more of the secrets and truths behind ATROX NOCTIS. This is a real world item; extremely rare, and will never be offered in this form again!

At this level, you will receive your name in the credits, and all the limited weapons and gear above. In addition, we will include both ATROX NOCTIS T-shirts, where's Pedro and party! This is a real world item; sport your love for the game and the music.

At this level, you will receive your name in the credits, and all the in game limited weapons and gear above. In addition, we will include your choice of ATROX NOCTIS: t-shirt. Also we will take your profile and face shot (picture) and turn you into a star as which ever NPC you choose to be, first come first choice. This is a real world item; sport your love for the game and the music.

ATROX NOCTIS consists of hundreds of stories, have you ever wanted to write a video game? Now you can be part of an incredible title of human evolution. At this level you get the in game items and get to contribute a story to the game to be ran live for the entire world. We will take your story and break it into tasks; fitting it into the world, allowing everyone to play through your adventure, and you will get full credit for your contribution in the credits. This is a great opportunity for up and coming authors and will get you first consideration for contributors for our up and coming short story collection, Thirteen Stories of the Apocalypse.

We desire to pump entertainment of every style into the club in the ATROX NOCTIS world. This is a special offer for anyone who performs or has a band or group that performs. All styles welcome! Supporters at this level will have the unique reward of receiving 9 live gigs in the in game clubs. This is more complex than most rewards, you must be able to book your live events somewhere (with access to the internet) in real live then we will hook your events into our club system so you are broadcast everywhere in the world the game is being played. You are guaranteed the first nine gigs, however if you are received well, we will continue to use your performances as often as we can fit them into the show schedules.

At this level, you will receive your name in the credits, and all the in game limited weapons and gear above. We\u2019ll throw in both shirts, a pen, and a charm. Also as a special contributor, you will receive one free edition of every sold in the item mall of ATROX NOCTIS for the next two years.

At this level, you will receive your name in the credits, and all the in game limited weapons and gear above. In addition, we will include the special edition leather bound \u201cThe Stranger\u201d manuscript signed by the author; we\u2019ll throw in both shirts, a pen, and a charm. In addition, both one member of Beat Thief and I will fly to your town, (anywhere continual US, we could do elsewhere, but you might have to help with the extended airfare\u2026) and hang out for a day, and put on a special performance in your honor. If you have no connections to a venue, and we can\u2019t work this out, it might just be in your presence with your stereo, but it will be an incredible experience!
